name: Shattered Soul (Blauhschwert, TobiToyota)
description:
Shattered Soul

Four different souls share one body and pursue other goals to help them achieve their goal.

Controls
  • Move: A, D, arrow left, arrow right
  • Jump: W, Space, arrow up

------------------------

  • green Soul:
    • Dash (only when moving): E
    • Jump on slimes like Mario

------------------------

  • blue Soul:
    • Dash (only when moving): E
    • Glide (only in air): W, Space, arrow up

------------------------

  • red Soul:
    • Attack: LMB, V

------------------------

  • orange Soul:
    • Bubble (to make slimes to jump pads): E

------------------------

USED ASSETS:

Musik

Main Character

TileSet
